fields.summary: Include offline API and Help documentation

status.name: Open

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I think it would be very beneficial if you could store a local copy of the Titanium HTML documentation in the Titanium Studio so that if you are developing without an internet connection (i.e. on a flight with no wi-fi) you could get at all the API documentation from within Studio.  I know there are copies on Github but they don't look current and also that is not a seamless way for users to get at the information.  Having it baked into the UI would be very slick and useful.

comments.body: Thank you for your valuable suggestion. This feature is on our radar and part of documentation roadmap. Please track TISTUD-1848 for further updates on this improvement.
